product_name: Dependable Foods Tomato Sauce - 106 oz.- Authentic California Vine to Bottle Blend - Kosher
description: Authentic Taste: Crafted from California's finest tomatoes, our Dependable Foods Tomato Sauce offers a truly authentic flavor profile.  Vine to Bottle: Made with care from vine to bottle, ensuring the freshest taste in every jar.  Kosher Certified: Our tomato sauce is kosher certified, meeting the highest standards of quality and purity.  Versatile Ingredient: Perfect for enhancing your favorite dishes, including pasta, pizza, and more.  Ingredients: Fresh Vine-Ripened Tomatoes, Sea Salt, Onion Powder, Garlic Powder, Natural Flavors, Spices and Citric Acid.
latest_reviews: This is a huge can of tomato sauce. My can arrived bent, but still not open and useable. The taste is pretty good, and of course you can add to it to make it your own. This size can would be great if you have an event or party that you need a ton of sauce for. Once you open it, there's really no closing it back up so you have to use it all or store it after.
It is a good basic tomato sauce.  I use a can when I make up a batch of pasta sauce, which my wife uses for many applications.
